text: I just voted no on final passage for the Gang of 8 comprehensive immigration reform bill: http://t.co/oWdF1MNk0S
My floor speech from earlier today to oppose #Go8 bill: http://t.co/oG2jawVcpp Click on link and help me RT if you share my concerns.
I support immigration reform. But #Go8 is not immigration reform. It is big government dysfunction. I am voting no: http://t.co/0Rx1s0lT78
There's simply no legitimate reason why we have to pass a one-size-fits-all 1
column4: 200-page
column5: take-it-or-leave-it #immigration bill.

text: the only reason #immigration reform is so controversial is because the Senate refuses to pass it one piece at a time.
The House appears to have learned from #Go8 dysfunction and wants no part of this.  They are passing step-by-step reforms.
The special interests had a huge hand in writing the #Go8 bill while the American people had no role: http://t.co/1XCVo3oPh5
The so-called comprehensive approach has been utterly discredited. #Go8 bill reaffirms why vast majority of Americans distrust Washington.
The #Go8 process has revealed all the problems inherent in passing massive pieces of legislation that try to fix all of problems at once.
For grand finale
column4: the #Go8 proponents substituted what is effectively a brand-new bill instead of the one we've been debating for 2 months.

text: For a 1
column4: 200-page bill we were allowed exactly nine roll call votes to amend #Go8 before the process was shut down.

text: They said there would be regular order for #Go8 on the floor of the senate
column4: but that turned out to be a false promise as well.

text: During committee markup Democrats & #Go8 Republicans voted as a block to defeat virtually all substantive amendments to improve the bill.
We were told that if we didn't like what was in #Go8 that we'd have an opportunity to fix it. But that wasn't true either.
From day one
column4: the country was misled about what was in #Go8 bill. The talking points never matched bill's reality: http://t.co/8uM7N7bSFY

text: As a matter of process
column4: senators should be embarrassed about how #Go8 bill has moved through the senate. http://t.co/ADQzNcmdHx

text: According to CBO
column4: #Go8 will reduce illegal immigration by just a mere 25% over the next ten years: reason alone to scrap entire bill.

text: The #Go8 bill transfers too much authority & discretion to the executive branch
column4: exacerbating an already widespread problem in federal gov.

text: The #Go8 bill remains grossly unfair to those who have languished in our current legal immigration system for decades.

text: As a matter of public policy
